text: Presidential elections were held in Cyprus on 28 January 2018.Lillikas becomes first official 2018 presidential candidate In Cyprus, 13 March 2017 As no candidate received a majority of the vote in the first round, a run-off was held on 4 February between the top two candidates, incumbent President Nicos Anastasiades of the Democratic Rally (DISY) and Stavros Malas of the Progressive Party of Working People. Anastasiades emerged as the winner with 55.99% of the vote. ==Electoral system== The President of Cyprus is elected using the two-round system;Cyprus IFES if no candidate gets a majority in the first round of voting, a run-off is held between the top two candidates. ==Candidates== Sample of the ballot used in the first round Sample of the ballot used in the second round *Nicos Anastasiades, DISY *Charis Aristeidou, Independent *Christos Christou, ELAM (Cyprus) *Andreas Efstratiou, Independent *Christakis Kapiliotis, Independent *Giorgos Lillikas, Citizens' Alliance *Stavros Malas, Progressive Party of Working PeopleMalas officially announces presidential candidacy Cyprus Mail, 2 September 2017 *Michail Mina, Organisation of Justice Fighters *Nikolas Papadopoulos, Democratic PartyDiko backs Papadopoulos, Akel mulls options Cyprus Mail, 27 April 2017 also endorsed by the Solidarity Movement and the Movement for Social DemocracySolidarity Movement endorses Papadopoulos Cyprus Mail, 4 May 2017Edek congress green lights Papadopoulos’ candidacy Cyprus Mail, 30 April 2017 == Opinion polls == === First round === {| class="wikitable" style="text- align:center;font-size:100%;line-height:14px;" |- style="background:lightgrey;" ! rowspan="3" style="width:120px;" | Pollster ! rowspan="3" style="width:80px;" | Date ! rowspan="3" style="width:50px;" | Abstention ! style="width:60px;" | ! style="width:60px;" | ! style="width:60px;" | ! style="width:60px;" | ! style="width:60px;" | ! rowspan="3" style="width:60px;" | Other ! rowspan="3" style="width:60px;" | Lead |- | bgcolor= | | bgcolor= | | bgcolor= | | bgcolor= | | bgcolor=#000000 | |- !
